summary: A configuration container that holds every architectural and training hyper‑parameter required to build a SeamlessM4Tv2 multimodal transformer, including vocab sizes, encoder/decoder depths, attention heads, dropout rates, speech‑encoder specifics, text‑to‑unit sub‑model settings, and HiFi‑GAN vocoder parameters, enabling consistent model construction and customization.
business_intent: Offer developers a unified, editable specification for initializing and fine‑tuning the SeamlessM4Tv2 model across multilingual text, speech, and speech‑to‑speech tasks, simplifying deployment and reproducibility of the system.
